Text: Mike Kim update Cc NonPrivilegedpst Hi Chris Here is a briefing from my phone conversation with Mike Kim regarding the usage reports Mike will give us more details when he gets back on Tuesday California Usage Extract MDA is the new meter database which contains extracted information from the Cheop System CSC system and updated position Mike may have data from and will be contacting us with this information on Tuesday Per Mike the deals have no specified baseline they must be taken at face value National Usage Extract ie Arch Diocese of Chicago MultiFiber Glass The National Usage data is extracted from the Fazer Database Also I left Dennis a message regarding the of the Discount Frozen Tariff vs the power deals in RPS I have not heard from him yet Thanks Annie The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this email by anyone else is unauthorized If you are not the intended recipient any disclosure copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful When addressed to our clients any opinions or advice contained in this email are subject to the terms and conditions expressed in the governing KPMG client engagement letter

RE FW Meeting with Kenny Ha Cc NonPrivilegedpst Paige Kenny said you would be the contact to clarify on settlement date We have seen some settlement language in the contracts stating that settlement is done quarterly As of now we added it into our form and are capturing the term if it is stated Is there anything else you know that we should be capturing regarding the settlement date Thanks Annie Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October AM To Subject RE FW Meeting with Kenny Ha Was there a todo for me or have we covered it This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this email by anyone else is unauthorized If you are not the intended recipient any disclosure copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful When addressed to our clients any opinions or advice contained in this email are subject to the terms and conditions expressed in the governing KPMG client engagement letter

Meeting with Kenny Ha Cc NonPrivilegedpst Chris Here is a briefing from our meeting with Kenny These are the fields he requested for In order to include these in the database we will need additional informationclarification from you and Paige Thanks Annie Pass through Cost Cost Type we need a list from you of the different types Percent Different percentages among cost types ie ICAP LL etc Pricing Fixed Indexed Type of Index we need a list from you of the different types Discount Frozen Tariff Frozen Tariff Date Incentive Percent and Period Per Kenny you would be the contact person fo this Currency Eurodollars US dollars Settlement Period Band MaxMin Calculated Monthly but may settle YearlyQuarterly Per Kenny Paige should be able to interpret this in the contract The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this email by anyone else is unauthorized If you are not the intended recipient any disclosure copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful When addressed to our clients any opinions or advice contained in this email are subject to the terms and conditions expressed in the governing KPMG client engagement letter

BaselineBand MetricsNonPrivilegedpst Chris These are the metrics for the reviewed California contracts Actual Baseline stating MWHs with Band MinMax of Baseline with KWH used at all facilities during the first contract year language with band of Baseline with Other language of Historical mo Avgsif available next mos from agreement date KWHs for months preceding the service date KWH used at all facilities during the first contract year OR if needed for first year the months preeceding the effective date with Band MWHfor first year and for each year there after the actual usage for the month period following the effective date Bandwidth with NO Baseline f Baseline with NO Bandwidth of NO Baseline and NO Bandwidth of In summary Contracts with both Baseline and Band information is of This is the total of those with ANY baseline language and band in the contract This may have changed from what we gave you yesterday since data was being entered as we spoke This is current as of last evening The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this email by anyone else is unauthorized If you are not the intended recipient any disclosure copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful When addressed to our clients any opinions or advice contained in this email are subject to the terms and conditions expressed in the governing KPMG client engagement letter
